name: Project ILE- PAX 2020 Demo
description:
In this retro-style scrolling shooter, you don't fire your own bullets-- you can only reflect those of your enemies. Move and rotate your shield around to dodge and deflect hostile bullets in order to make it to the level's end and deliver your precious cargo.

Pilot the cutting-edge delivery drone, the ILE Nimbus, and it's navigator, MADDy, and keep the world safe as rambunctious partiers let loose!

(USB Controllers should be supported!)

A student project from Lake Washington Institute of Technology.
